conbody.p:
To easily navigate through the various sections in , there is a breadcrumb trail below the top bar. Breadcrumb
Breadcrumb

ol.li: Home page of , which is the .
The second item of the breadcrumb is the name of the customer or partner.
The third item is the name of the customer's system.
The possible fourth item of the breadcrumb is the name of a subsection of a system's dashboard page.

conbody.p: Click any of the items to return to that level. For example, if you click the second item in the breadcrumb, you return to the customer's dashboard.

ol.li: Home page of , which is the dashboard of your account.
The second item is the name of the selected system.
The possible third item is the name of a subsection of a system's dashboard page.

conbody.p: Click any of the items to return to that level. For example, if you click the second item in the breadcrumb, you return to the selected system.
